biotools.summary: SHiny application for Metagenomic ANalysis including the normalization, the differential analysis and mutiple visualization. It is based on DESeq2 R package [Anders and Huber 2010] for the analysis of metagenomic data, as suggested in [McMurdie and Holmes 2014, Jonsson2016]. It robustly identifies the differential abundant genera with the Generalized Linear Model implemented in DESeq2 [Love 2014].

bioschemas.name: SHAMAN

It robustly identifies the differential abundant genera with the Generalized Linear Model implemented in DESeq2 [Love 2014].
